description: Schema for the fortls Fortran Language Server

config.description: Configuration options file (default file name: .fortlsrc, other default supported names: .fortls.json, .fortls)
config.title: Config

nthreads.description: Number of threads to use during workspace initialization (default: 4)
nthreads.title: Nthreads

notify_init.description: Send notification message when workspace initialization is complete
notify_init.title: Notify Init

recursion_limit.description: Set the maximum recursion depth for the parser (default: 1000)
recursion_limit.title: Recursion Limit

sort_keywords.description: Display variable keywords information, function/subroutine definitions, etc. in a consistent (sorted) manner default: no sorting, display code as is)
sort_keywords.title: Sort Keywords

disable_autoupdate.description: fortls automatically checks PyPi for newer version and installs them.Use this option to disable the autoupdate feature.
disable_autoupdate.title: Disable Autoupdate

preserve_keyword_order.description: DEPRECATED, this is now the default. To sort use sort_keywords
preserve_keyword_order.title: Preserve Keyword Order

debug_log.description: Generate debug log in project root folder
debug_log.title: Debug Log

incl_suffixes.description: Consider additional file extensions to the default (default: .F, .F77, .F90, .F95, .F03, .F08, .FOR, .FPP (lower & upper casing))
incl_suffixes.title: Incl Suffixes

excl_suffixes.description: Source file extensions to be excluded (default: set())
excl_suffixes.title: Excl Suffixes

autocomplete_no_prefix.description: Do not filter autocomplete results by variable prefix
autocomplete_no_prefix.title: Autocomplete No Prefix

autocomplete_no_snippets.description: Do not use snippets with place holders in autocomplete results
autocomplete_no_snippets.title: Autocomplete No Snippets

autocomplete_name_only.description: Complete only the name of procedures and not the parameters
autocomplete_name_only.title: Autocomplete Name Only

lowercase_intrinsics.description: Use lowercase for intrinsics and keywords in autocomplete requests
lowercase_intrinsics.title: Lowercase Intrinsics

use_signature_help.description: Use signature help instead of subroutine/function snippets. This effectively sets --autocomplete_no_snippets
use_signature_help.title: Use Signature Help

variable_hover.description: DEPRECATED: This option is always on. Show hover information for variables
variable_hover.title: Variable Hover

hover_signature.description: Show signature information in hover for arguments
hover_signature.title: Hover Signature

hover_language.description: Language used for responses to hover requests a VSCode language id (default: fortran90)
hover_language.title: Hover Language

folding_range.description: Fold editor based on language keywords
folding_range.title: Folding Range

pp_suffixes.description: File extensions to be parsed ONLY for preprocessor commands (default: all uppercase source file suffixes)
pp_suffixes.title: Pp Suffixes

include_dirs.description: Folders containing preprocessor files with extensions PP_SUFFIXES.
include_dirs.title: Include Dirs

pp_defs.description: A dictionary with additional preprocessor definitions. Preprocessor definitions are normally included via INCLUDE_DIRS
pp_defs.title: Pp Defs

symbol_skip_mem.description: Do not include type members in document symbol results
symbol_skip_mem.title: Symbol Skip Mem

title: fortls schema
